T02D3209:215a-1: ku ru kull'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3209:215a-4: sgrol ma las nges par 'byung ba'i ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3209:215a-5: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D3209:215a-6: lhar bcas lha min mi rnams kyang //
T02D3209:215a-7: rtag tu ci bgyi bar 'gyur ba'i //
T02D3209:215a-8: sgrol ma de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D3209:215b-0: dang por re zhig sngags pas bud med @215b kyi
T02D3209:215b-1: 'gro ba pa'i 'drul 'jug la sogs pa dang bal
T02D3209:215b-2: zhing yid kyis rjes su mthun pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig
T02D3209:215b-3: tu bde ba'i stan la gnas la /
T02D3209:215b-4: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su
T02D3209:215b-5: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3209:215b-6: 'od zer dang bcas pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge
T02D3209:215b-7: hr'i:rnam par spros pa'i 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs rnams
T02D3209:215b-8: kyis 'jig rten kun du snang bar byed pa sngon
T02D3209:215b-9: du 'gro bas / ku ru kulle'i ri la gnas
T02D3209:215b-10: pa'i ku ru kulle'i bcom ldan 'das ma legs par
T02D3209:215b-11: bskul zhing spyan drangs pa mdun gyi nam mkha'i yul
T02D3209:215b-12: phyogs su legs par bsams la /
T02D3209:215b-13: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis nges par
T02D3209:215b-14: sprul pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog dang
T02D3209:215b-15: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
T02D3209:215b-16: par bya ba'o // de'i rjes la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3209:215b-18: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3209:215b-20: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3209:215b-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3209:215b-22: bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs //
T02D3209:215b-23: bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3209:215b-24: skye dgu'i bsong nams la rjes rang //
T02D3209:215b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3209:215b-26: zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum du gdon no //
T02D3209:215b-27: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon du
T02D3209:215b-28: 'gro bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rnam
T02D3209:215b-29: par bsgoms la / de byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D3209:215b-30: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no ;
T02D3209:215b-31: / de'i rjes la 'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal bar snying rjes dmigs la /
T02D3209:215b-32: rang gi sems nyid sa bon gyi gzugs su rnam par blta bar bya'o //
T02D3209:215b-33: de yongs su gyur pa las autpala dmar po'i steng
T02D3209:215b-34: du dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3209:215b-35: zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D3209:215b-36: gyis sngar bzhin du 'jig rten kun du snang bar
T02D3209:215b-37: byas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba mtha'
T02D3209:215b-38: yas pa rnams yang dag par bskul nas spyan drangs
T02D3209:215b-39: la nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3209:216a-0: autpala la sogs pa rnams yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog dmar po @216a * //
T02D3209:216a-1: stod shag shin tu dmar ba 'od zer dmar po
T02D3209:216a-2: sa khor yug tu gyur pa rna gdub dang dbu
T02D3209:216a-3: rgyan dmar po dang ldan pa /
T02D3209:216a-4: phyag bzhi la g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa /
T02D3209:216a-5: gnyis pas yang dag bkang ba'i mda'/
T02D3209:216a-6: g-yon pas rin po che'i gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D3209:216a-7: gnyis pas autpala dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3209:216a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan la ste /
T02D3209:216a-9: ku ru kulle'i ri'i phug na bzhugs shing skra can
T02D3209:216a-10: gyi mgo la gnas pa'i chung ma dang bcas pa'i
T02D3209:216a-11: 'dod pa'i lha'i steng na padma dang zla ba dmar
T02D3209:216a-13: / sgeg pa'i nyams kyis 'gyur mdog cing thog ma'i
T02D3209:216a-14: lang tsho dang ldan pa'i ku ru kulle bsgom par
T02D3209:216a-15: bya ba'o // de ltar dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3209:216a-16: skad cig gis ye shes pa mdun du legs par spyan drang zhing legs par mchod de /
T02D3209:216a-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kha'i lam nas nang du gzhug par bya ba'o //
T02D3209:216a-18: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D3209:216a-19: thal mo kha sbyar la gung mo gnyis rtse sprad
T02D3209:216a-20: nas bslang ba'i nang du srin lag gnyis bcug la
T02D3209:216a-21: / gung mo dag gi rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis
T02D3209:216a-22: legs par bya zhing mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug
T02D3209:216a-23: pa ni de'i rnam pa yin pas na autpala'i phyag
T02D3209:216a-25: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D3209:216a-26: ji ltar byin pa chen po'i che //
T02D3209:216a-27: bdag kyang bskyab par bgyi don du //
T02D3209:216a-28: bdag la mkha' rdor la sogs stsol //
T02D3209:216a-29: zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer ba'o //
T02D3209:216a-30: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa'i ;
T02D3209:216a-31: / dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D3209:216a-32: bdag gis sbyin bya sangs rgyas kun //
T02D3209:216a-33: gsang gsum gnas las legs byung yin //
T02D3209:216a-34: zhes bya ba 'di brjod nas sangs rgyas kyi bkas
T02D3209:216a-35: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur sbyin
T02D3209:216a-36: par byed par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3209:216a-37: dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas rnam par gnas pa yin no //
T02D3209:216a-38: de ltar bsgom pa byas la bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D3209:216a-39: myur ba ma yin bul bar ma yin mi gsal
T02D3209:216a-40: ba ma yin yan lag dang bral bar ma yin
T02D3209:216a-41: pa dang / yan lag ma yin pa'i rtog pa yang spangs la /
T02D3209:216a-42: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D3209:216b-0: de ltar @216b thun tshod gsum du rim pa bzhin
T02D3209:216b-1: du skya khur dang sha kha ra la sogs pa'i
T02D3209:216b-2: gtor ma btang ba sngon du btang bas gus pa
T02D3209:216b-3: dang bcas shing rgyun mi 'chad par bsam pa brtan
T02D3209:216b-4: pos zla ba drug tu bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3209:216b-6: de nas ni zla ba dang po la nang dang nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3209:216b-7: zla ba gnyis pa la ni zas bsod par gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3209:216b-8: gsum pa la ni gos sna tshogs rnyed par 'gyur ro /
T02D3209:216b-9: bzhi pa la ni tambu la rnam pa sna tshogs pa rgyun mi 'chang par rnyed do //
T02D3209:216b-10: lnga pa la ni ngo mtshar che ba'i gzugs la
T02D3209:216b-11: sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i bud med 'du
T02D3209:216b-12: bar 'gyur ro // zla ba drug pa la ni
T02D3209:216b-13: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang
T02D3209:216b-14: mi'am ci la sogs pa'i bu mo legs par 'du
T02D3209:216b-15: bar 'gyur ro // bar 'gyur ro // bcom ldan
T02D3209:216b-16: 'das ma bsgom pa la ni phal cher bud med
T02D3209:216b-17: rnams rnyed kyi nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3209:216b-18: des bdud kyi las de dag rnams yongs su spangs la bcom ldan 'das ma bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3209:216b-19: rmi lam mam dngos su yang rung ste /
T02D3209:216b-20: gsal bar bka' bsgo bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3209:216b-21: ral gri dang mig rtsi dang rkang pa'i byug pa dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D3209:216b-22: bcud kyis len dang mkha' spyod dang zhing skyong dang
T02D3209:216b-23: sa 'og grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams
T02D3209:216b-24: bsgrub par bya'o // gal te bka' bsgo ba med
T02D3209:216b-25: par gyur na de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya
T02D3209:216b-26: bcings la mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ba la
T02D3209:216b-27: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba drug pa
T02D3209:216b-28: gzhan gyi zla ba la mtshan rangs pa bzlas par
T02D3209:216b-29: bsgrub par bya'o // bya ba'o // de nas ni 'bar bar 'gyur zhing dngos grub kyang 'byung ste /
T02D3209:216b-30: phyag rgya des tshangs pa dang /
T02D3209:216b-34: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams yang dag
T02D3209:216b-35: par drangs shing legs par 'dus nas ci bgyi nyid
T02D3209:216b-36: du bsnyen te / sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed do //
T02D3209:216b-37: deng nas bzung nas skye ba dang /
T02D3209:216b-39: 'chi ba dang bral bar gyur pa grub nas 'jig
T02D3209:216b-40: rten gyi khams gzhan du phyin cing de bzhin gshegs
T02D3209:216b-41: pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang sa dang gzungs
T02D3209:216b-42: la sogs pa nas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3209:217a-0: @217a * // sgrol ma las 'byung ba'i ku ru kulle'i tshig lhug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
